name: Haunted House
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The house has a malevolent, oppressive atmosphere with the sound of ghostly whispers and the cold scent of the grave. The air carries the weight of supernatural evil and the horrors of the past, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of supernatural danger and the constant threat of malevolent spirits.
